prTitle: feat: implement comprehensive CSS variables and design tokens with global styles
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented comprehensive CSS variables (design tokens) and global styles for the lingerie website project.

### What was implemented:

#### CSS Variables (`src/styles/variables.css`) - 294 lines
- **Color Palette**: Primary brand colors (#d4567b pink), secondary grays, text colors, backgrounds, borders, and state colors
- **Typography System**: Font families (Inter, Playfair Display, Fira Code), weights, sizes (xs-6xl), line heights, letter spacing
- **Spacing System**: 4px base unit with consistent scale (0-256px), semantic aliases (xs-3xl)
- **Layout & Grid**: Container max-widths, responsive breakpoints, 12-column grid system
- **Border Radius**: Complete scale from 2px to full rounded
- **Shadows**: 7-level shadow system plus focus shadows for accessibility
- **Z-Index Scale**: Organized layering from dropdowns (1000) to toasts (1080)
- **Transitions**: Duration, timing functions, and composite transition presets
- **Component Tokens**: Button, card, form, navigation, and product card specific variables
- **Responsive Features**: Mobile-first adjustments and reduced motion support

#### Global Styles (`src/styles/global.css`) - 253 lines
- **Modern CSS Reset**: Box-sizing, margin/padding normalization
- **Base Typography**: Heading styles, paragraph optimization, text wrapping
- **Interactive Elements**: Link, button, and form styling with focus states
- **Accessibility Features**: Focus-visible outlines, reduced motion support, high contrast mode
- **Media Improvements**: Responsive images, print styles
- **Utility Classes**: Screen reader only, skip links for navigation

#### Integration (`src/main.jsx`) - 13 lines
- Proper CSS import order: variables first, then global styles
- React 18 setup with StrictMode
- Ready for App component integration

### Key Features:
- **Mobile-First Design**: Responsive breakpoints and container adjustments
- **Accessibility**: Focus management, reduced motion, high contrast support
- **Performance**: Optimized font rendering and smooth scrolling
- **Maintainability**: Semantic naming convention and organized categories
- **Future-Ready**: Dark mode structure and component token system

Closes #82

### Tasks Completed:
- ✅ `task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-1`: Create CSS variables and design tokens
- ✅ `task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-2`: Implement CSS reset and global styles  
- ✅ `task-lingerie-website-feat-global-styles-3`: Integrate global styles into application
